DomainNames.description: Specifies the LDAP domain (CN) to which we are connecting. Domains may be space-delimited, comma-delimited, or an array.

Servers.description: Specifies a list of servers to authenticate each domain.

BindDN.description: Specifies the distinguished name upon which to perform the bind.

BindPass.description: Specifies the password upon which to perform the bind.

BaseDN.description: Specifies the DN within which a search is performed.

SearchTree.description: Specifies whether or not to perform a recursive search on the BaseDN.

SearchFilter.description: The filter to be used when performing a search. By default, searches may be performed against first name, last name or username. Disabled accounts are filtered.

EncryptionType.description: The encryption method to use on the connection. Valid values are false, 'ssl', 'tls'.

UseLocal.description: Specifies whether local authentication may be performed against the MediaWiki database.

RequireDomain.description: Requires the user select a domain, even if there is only one to select from.

MapGroups.description: Maps LDAP groups to equivalent MediaWiki groups.

CacheGroupMap.description: Specifies the period of time for which LDAP grouping should be synced for a user.

IsActiveDirectory.description: Are we connecting to an Active-Directory LDAP server?

IsOpenLDAP.description: Are we connecting to an OpenLDAP server?

UsernameField.description: Specifies the LDAP/AD Field containing the username.

DisplayNameField.description: Specifies the LDAP/AD Field containing the display name.
